com.neatnodes.utils

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neatnodes.utils.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration objects parse configuration files and store the parameters used by the NEAT algorithm. Configuration files must follow the Java property file format. The following is a list of valid properties that will be picked up by this class and their default values: 
     
 WEIGHT_MUTATION_CHANCE=0.8
 NODE_MUTATION_CHANCE=0.03
 LINK_MUTATION_CHANCE=0.05
 DISABLE_MUTATION_CHANCE=0.75
 E_WEIGHT=1.0
 D_WEIGHT=1.0
 W_WEIGHT=0.4
 COMPATABILITY_THRESHOLD=1.0
 POPULATION_SIZE=150
 GENERATIONS=1000
 CROSSOVER_PROPORTION=0.75
 DEPTH=3
 STYLE_PATH={jar location}/styles
 RENDER_STYLE=normal
    Author:
    Sam Griffin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double compatabilityThreshold
      The compatibility threshold used to determine whether a Genome qualifies as a member of a Species.
      double crossoverProportion
      The fraction of offspring which are created by crossing two Genomes.
      int depth
      The number of cycles to run each Genome for before reading a result.
      double disableMutationChance
      The chance of a disable mutation occurring.
      double DWeight
      A coefficient used to adjust the importance of the D term when calculating compatibility distance.
      double EWeight
      A coefficient used to adjust the importance of the E term when calculating compatibility distance.
      int generations
      The number of generations to run the NEAT algorithm for.
      double linkMutationChance
      The chance of a link mutation occurring.
      double nodeMutationChance
      The chance of a node mutation occurring.
      int populationSize
      The number of Genomes in each generation.
      java.lang.String renderStyle
      The name of the style that the GenomeRenderer will use to display Genomes.
      java.lang.String stylePath
      The full path that the GenomeRenderer will look for style sheets in.
      double weightMutationChance
      The chance of a weight mutation occurring.
      double WWeight
      A coefficient used to adjust the importance of the "W bar" term when calculating compatibility distance.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Configuration()
      Creates a new Configuration with all parameters set to their default values.

      Creates a new Configuration from a properties file.

    • Field Detail

      • weightMutationChance

        public final double weightMutationChance
        The chance of a weight mutation occurring.

      • nodeMutationChance

        public final double nodeMutationChance
        The chance of a node mutation occurring.

      • linkMutationChance

        public final double linkMutationChance
        The chance of a link mutation occurring.

      • disableMutationChance

        public final double disableMutationChance
        The chance of a disable mutation occurring.

      • EWeight

        public final double EWeight
        A coefficient used to adjust the importance of the E term when calculating compatibility distance.

      • DWeight

        public final double DWeight
        A coefficient used to adjust the importance of the D term when calculating compatibility distance.

      • WWeight

        public final double WWeight
        A coefficient used to adjust the importance of the "W bar" term when calculating compatibility distance.

      • compatabilityThreshold

        public final double compatabilityThreshold
        The compatibility threshold used to determine whether a Genome qualifies as a member of a Species.

      • populationSize

        public final int populationSize
        The number of Genomes in each generation.

      • generations

        public final int generations
        The number of generations to run the NEAT algorithm for.

      • crossoverProportion

        public final double crossoverProportion
        The fraction of offspring which are created by crossing two Genomes. The rest are cloned from a single Genome.

      • depth

        public final int depth
        The number of cycles to run each Genome for before reading a result. It is the equivalent of the "depth" in a feed-forward network.

      • stylePath

        public final java.lang.String stylePath
        The full path that the GenomeRenderer will look for style sheets in. Must not be a relative path. If you use backslashes, you must escape them (e.g. \\).

      • renderStyle

        public final java.lang.String renderStyle
        The name of the style that the GenomeRenderer will use to display Genomes. The name must correspond to a style sheet.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.lang.String propertiesFile)
        Creates a new Configuration from a properties file. Any parameters not listed in the file will be assigned their default values.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - The path to the properties file.

      • Configuration

        public Configuration()
        Creates a new Configuration with all parameters set to their default values.
